description:
Keep this shell close at hand when exploring in questionable weather. The versatile Daybreak Jacket combines weather-resistant protection with a packable weight for hiking or adventuring. Stretchy fabric provides unrestricted range of motion and withstand the abuse of the trail. Wondering about this jacket's sustainability? It uses a fluorocarbon-free finish, and is completely recyclable, so you can feel good about your contribution to the planet while you explore it.

  • Durable Prime Ripstop™ material is wind- and water-resistant for light weather protection
  • Fabric is 177gsm polyester with 38% recycled fibres
  • Mechanical stretch moves with you
  • Elastic cuffs and adjustable bottom hem
  • Stuffs into one of the 2 zippered front pockets
  • Fluorocarbon-free Durable Water Repellent finish
  • Fully recyclable
name: Houdini Daybreak Jacket - Men's
